detail_desc: Short, A-line dress in soft, slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with a flounced trim, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with roll edges at the cuffs and hem and a small fabric appliqué at the bottom.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ribbed leggings designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Imitation leather sandals with a hook and loop fastener, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft jersey with a glittery print motif on the front, short sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Sandals in woven fabric with an adjustable, lightly padded hook and loop tab at the front and at the back of the heel. Moulded rubber soles, fluted underneath.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in printed jersey.
Low platform trainers in cotton canvas with lacing at the top and a wide loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles. Platform front approx. 2.5 cm. Platform back 5 cm.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a padded edge and tongue. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Linen dressing gown with two front pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Tumble-drying will help to keep the linen soft.
Faux fur trainers with embroidery at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved top in stretch viscose jersey with a lace yoke, mesh at the top, and lace trim around the sleeves.
Slim-fit trousers in washed cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Poncho towel in double-weave organic cotton. Hood with ears on top.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with gathers in the side seams for a comfortable fit over the tummy.

Track jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric made from recycled polyester. Stand-up collar with a drawstring hood concealed inside. Zip down the front, diagonal front pockets, covered elastication at the cuffs and covered elastication and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a gently rounded hem. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.
Short dress in patterned mesh with a round neckline, short sleeves and flared skirt. Jersey lining.
High-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and flared legs.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Blouse in a viscose and cotton weave with a round neckline and pin-tucks and inset lace trims at the top and on the sleeves. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, a gathered yoke, long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a flared hem.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm.
Short, straight-cut jacket in stretch twill with a shimmering finish. Buttons and a frill detail down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and a button at the cuffs.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Backpack in woven fabric with a roll-top opening with a zip and adjustable tab with a plastic fastener. Handle at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps, a side compartment and zipped inner compartment in mesh. Zipped and padded laptop compartment at the back, two adjustable tabs with plastic fasteners at each side and a padded base plate. Lined in recycled polyester. Width at the base approx. 26 cm. Closed height approx. 44 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Leg warmers in a soft rib knit with roll edges.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves and patch front pockets.
Baby hat in soft cotton jersey with appliqués in the shape of long rabbit ears at the top and a strap with a press-stud under the chin.
Imitation leather jacket with quilted details, a ribbed stand-up collar and detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, slub cotton jersey with a round neckline and buttons down the front. Flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders, and a gathered seam at the waist.

Long shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft ribbed jersey.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a text print on the front. Jersey-lined hood, long raglan sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with buttons at the back of the neck, a cut-out section at the back and short trumpet sleeves.
Short dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed neckline and short puff sleeves with ribbed trims. Soft brushed inside.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Set with a bodysuit, trousers, pyjamas and a hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit with press-studs at one side and at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet. All-in-one pyjamas with press-studs down the front and the insides of the legs, and full feet. Hat with sewn-on ears and a turned-up hem.

Calf-length dress in spotted mesh with embroidery. V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs, an elasticated, gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Short trenchcoat in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with decorative shoulder tabs, a small stand-up collar and draped lapels. Side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Sleeveless top in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif. Bottoms with an all-over print and elasticated waist.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Shorter blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a wrapover front and back, concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and ties at the back. Short puff sleeves with smocked trims, and smocking at the back of the hem.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and diagonal side pockets. Jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. (Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.) The socks are made partly from organic cotton.
Straight-style, knee-length dress in a soft chunky knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.

Sandals in patterned ethylene-vinyl acetate with a small loop at the back and straps with hook and loop fasteners. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester. Moulded insoles with a textured pattern to give the feet a better grip, and patterned soles.
Leggings in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a wide, elasticated waistband.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Ankle-length trousers in airy cotton twill with a high, pleated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets with a decorative press-stud and zipped back pockets. Wide, tapered legs with seams.
Treggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short shorts in airy, patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist and frilled hems. Lined.
Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Sleeveless, gently flared tunic in soft viscose jersey. Lined at the top.

Blouse in airy, patterned crêpe with a small, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with a scalloped lace trim. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves, short legs and press-stud fastenings.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Loose-fitting strappy top in an airy satin weave with a V-neck.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, lined hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, a zipped chest pocket and patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs and a snow flap with press-studs at the waist. Fleece lining. Reflective details.The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
